sentences.sContent: The compounds "likely have an effecton motor neurons"—responsible for controlling movements—"but that isa hunch at present, based on the type of atrophy we saw, " Hughes said inan email.
sentences.sContent_eng: The compounds "likely have an effecton motor neurons"—responsible for controlling movements—"but that isa hunch at present, based on the type of atrophy we saw, " Hughes said inan email.
sentences.sCn: 这些化合物“可能对运动神经元（负责控制运动）产生作用”----“根据我们观察到的萎缩症类型，目前这只是个预测，”休斯在一封电子邮件中说。

remMethod.val: a(无) + troph(营养) + y → 无营养会萎缩 → 萎缩

words.tran: 萎缩（atrophy的过去分词）；使衰退
